title: Falling Star
author: Bat
content: A handle made of a brilliant gemstone shard that reflects an endless sea of stars connected to a golden chain that attaches it to a heavy radiant sphere.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.
This flail holds 9 charges, and regains 1d6+3 expended charges daily at dawn.

Spells: While holding this flail you can use an action to expend some of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it with a spell attack modifier of +6 and DC 14, unless your spell attack modifier or spell save DC, if any, is higher: Guiding Bolt  (2nd-level version, 3 charges), Darkness (3 charges), or Daylight, (6 charges).
Proficiency with a flail allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.
